text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Wow……! That's amazing, Helios. 
You made that song too?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Das' right, YO☆ 
Boom chika pah! Boom boom, pah!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Love you love you, Lady! Love you, Lady! 
Heyy!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Love you love you, Lady! Love you, Lady! 
Milady, oh I! Totally luv you, heyy!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
For real!? Wait, wait, my lady! 
This is still just the intro! The intro! 
My endless love comes next! 
It's gonna be heart-melting!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: I have other plans to prioritize.

text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text:
……Ah, I know, Helios. Why don't we 
record the rest on my phone?

text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text:
If we send it to you, will you give it a listen 
when you have the time? Since Helios went 
through the trouble of making a song for you.

text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ahaha. Alright, expect a video later then.
